definition: inscribed stone tablet placed in the tomb/memorial inscription on such a tablet

sentences.english: Look , I am very haleness! You are a enmity fetch among innumerability. Foolish and clumsiness are your epitaph.
sentences.chinese: 你是无数冤魂中的一个，愚蠢和笨拙是你的墓志铭。

sentences.english: You are a enmity fetch among innumerability . Foolish and clumsiness are your epitaph.
sentences.chinese: 你是无数冤魂中的一个，愚蠢和笨拙是你的墓志铭。

sentences.english: The second chapter is the epitaph's development at the beginning of Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第二章为初唐墓志铭发展概况。

sentences.english: And I just started noticing inscriptions on the tombstones , epitaphs.
sentences.chinese: 而且我恰好开始注意到墓碑及墓志上的铭文。

sentences.english: In the absence of epitaphs found, the owner's identity is not know.
sentences.chinese: 由于没有发现墓志，墓主的身份尚不得知。

sentences.english: Yuan Shu Epitaph of the precious value in the art of calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 元淑墓志的珍贵价值是在书法艺术方面。

sentences.english: Chen Liangshao's epitaph was discovered in 2002 to be possessed by a curio merchant.
sentences.chinese: 陈良绍墓志于2002年春在古玩商人处发现。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter is the poet epitaph's value and influence at the beginning of Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第五章为初唐诗人墓志铭的价值及影响。

sentences.english: In recent years, there are some new materials about Northern Wei Dynasty epitaphs unearthed in Luoyang.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，洛阳出土北魏墓志又出现了一些新的材料。

sentences.english: The appendix is "At the beginning of a Tang Poet Inscription Famous Index".
sentences.chinese: 附录为《本文所引初唐诗人墓志篇名索引》。

sentences.english: Lemaire dates the object to 63 A.
sentences.chinese: 勒迈里判断该墓志铭的年代为公元63年。

sentences.english: The Epitaph of Wang Tai-ruren, Xiong Mingyu's Mother, in the Ming Dynasty has never been seen in any description.
sentences.chinese: 明代熊明遇之母王太孺人墓志至今未见有著录。

sentences.english: Wit is the epitaph of an emotion. ----Nietzche.
Sacred hearts, epitaphs , touched by winds of change.
sentences.chinese: 神圣的心，墓志铭，回转的风的触碰。

sentences.english: Many scholars have already made good use of the epitaphs in the researches on Tang poets.
sentences.chinese: 利用墓志，研究唐代诗人，前人也做过许多研究。

sentences.english: Female Epitaphs in the Southern Dynasties are the precious documents materials.
sentences.chinese: 南朝女性墓志是珍贵的文献资料。
